https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: I don't know, Why I didn't get job or project at upwork

messages.Christine A: These stupid canned questions are useless and should be removed. I see them as a sign of a client not caring enough about his project (otherwise he'd type in his own, specific project-related questions, not click on pre-canned).Definitely. The projects that have vague, one-sentence descriptions and then five canned questions annoy me the most. The client will say something like, "I need a brochure" and then say, "What project have you done that's most like this one, and why?"Hard pass.
messages.Allyson H: Yes, I agree these are a sign of them not caring. I have no idea what things look like on their end either I assume when they write the post they have a list of questions they can choose from or they can create their own? I wish we could see what the process is like for a Client, because I have had new people ask me how to do things on here too, which is always weird...I get that they're learning, but there's also the forum, FAQ section, or you can probably contact someone directly.
messages.Tonya P: Yes, I agree these are a sign of them not caring. I have no idea what things look like on their end either I assume when they write the post they have a list of questions they can choose from or they can create their own? I wish we could see what the process is like for a Client, because I have had new people ask me how to do things on here too, which is always weird...I get that they're learning, but there's also the forum, FAQ section, or you can probably contact someone directly.Hire someone to proofread a short piece or perform some other task you need. Understanding botth sides is very useful.
messages.Phyllis G: More than once I've responded "I don't know yet whether or not I'm a good fit but you invited me and I'm interested in learning more." Honestly, I couldn't tell you whether it came to anything or not because I almost never give a second thought to an UW bid or an invitation response until/unless I hear back from the client. Most of the ones that use canned questions don't come back, I think, and that's fine with me. I consider them a useful pre-screening tool for me. Clients who are initially clueless can turn out OK but it can also be a sign of laziness.Time spent submitting bids, responding to invitations, tweaking my profile... it's all amortized across the year, it's a cost of doing business. I make a judgement call each time I decide to invest or not invest in pursuing an opportunity. Some days peanuts, some days shells.
messages.Kim F: "What project have you done that's most like this one, and why?"That one irritates me beyond belief. I assume it should be howthat project is similar rather than whyyou did it? If you take it as written,99% of the time the answer is likely to be 'to earn money'. Once in a blue moon, it might be 'because the client was exceptionally good looking,' 'I'm so brill at this and felt like showing off' or some other odd thing. But it's beyond me how such assertions could help anyone. Especially if the client was having an ugly day.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/New-to-U.title: Re: Get Profile Feedback from Experienced Freelancers on Upwork

messages.Muhammad Shoaib A: I would like to say Big thanks to my Gurus of Upwork Experienced Freelancers.Please review my Profile.
messages.Afsheen M: hiHere is the link to my profile.https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~014ecc1c0bb47896acPlease review it.Also, please guide me about proposal writing I think maybe I'm not writing them in a way that I can land a job.I look forward to hearing from you soon.Regards.
messages.Aditi J: Afsheen, your profile reads well. Consider adding prior job experiences. If you have not held any formal job titles, it might be a bit difficult to gain traction on this forum. You could add any freelance assignments that you may have done or any other volunteer work. Also, consider adding testimonials.Good luck, I wish you the best.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Re: Can I work by login into my account if I'm going on vacations outside the country

messages.Muntaha M: Hello,If I am planning to go on vacation outside the country so can I work by login into my Upwork account using a different laptop?Thank you.
messages.Ashraf K: I don't think it should be a problem, but now you got me thinking and I am curious to learn what @Petra, @Peterson and other senior members of the forum think.But I think freedom and flexibility to choose from where, how, when, and with whom you wish to work was a major part of freelancing career!So, I don't think it should be a problem if you are able to validate and verify your account even on a different laptop and a new location!
messages.Bojan S: Hi Muntaha,Yes, you are allowed to use diferent laptop to log into yuor account. It's important that you don't share your log in credentials with anybody and don't log into other users' accounts as it's a serious violation of Upwork TOS.Thank you!

messages.Jonas J: Hey Friends,I'm interested in how "Upwork" works with Marketing services, do I need off side contracts? And are there any funnels through which pay for people to pay for the ad spend?

messages.Reina C: Has there been an updated solution to verifying bank account? I am unable to select the verify button after I enter the two small deposits.
messages.Md Nazmul I: I think your given bank name or account number mismatched. Please wait for an expert Upwork support team will help you to solve this issue.Hi GoeN, can you please help her.
messages.Maria T: I think your given bank name or account number mismatched. Please wait for an expert Upwork support team will help you to solve this issue.Hi GoeN, can you please help her.I don't know who told you that forum badges are good for something, but they lied to you.You have already been told twice that they are NOT good for anything, so maybe you should stop trying to "help", just by posting something on the forums.
messages.Martina P: I think your given bank name or account number mismatched. Please wait for an expert Upwork support team will help you to solve this issue.Hi GoeN, can you please help her.Hey Md. These gurus, they know nothing. They are just jealous. In truth, as you clearly know by now, being a frequent poster in the forum comes with huge benefits, untold riches, and reverence. Ah, the reverence! Don't let anybody tell you otherwise. Keep on postin', cowboy!
messages.Bojan S: Hi Reina,Could you please clear your cache and cookies or log in with another browser to check if you`re still experiencing the same issue? Let us know if the issue persists. Thank you.

https://community.upwork.com/t5/New-to-U.title: Can’t get a rising talent badge

messages.Andrea G: HiProdyne,It looks like you've got your Job Success Score!Once you have enough work history on Upwork, your Rising Talent status is automatically replaced by a JSS.Once you earn a Job Success Score, you can start working towardTop Ratedstatus.Thanks!
messages.Luiggi R: Hi Ahmed,The Rising Talent badge is automatically assigned when a freelancer meets the requirements listed here. Once you qualify for the badge, you will receive a notification letting you know and it will also reflect on your profile.
messages.Bojan S: Hi Usama,Rising Talent status is automatically applied to users whose profiles meetall of the requirements. You are on your way to geta Job Success Score, one of the requirements to earn and maintain Top Rated status. To get the Top Rated badge, you'll need to fulfill all of the requirements mentioned in thishelp article.Thank you!
messages.Yasir M: Hello dear, Hope you're doing well and great. I wanna ask you a question about the Rising Talent badge. I have passed my Upwork Readiness Test with a 5.0 score and still, there's no badge on my profile.

messages.Sadaf H: Hi All,I just hired a graphic designer for brand designing. She sent me logo option and i finalized one. Now when i check pinteret / google that logo design seems to be on all free logo app . I am very disappointed as i though i was paying for genuine work. I have commited to fixed amount of $180 of which $70 is for logo design. Can i dispute the work and get back my funds which are still in escow?Thanks
messages.Goran V: Hi Sadaf,I`m sorry to hear about the bad experience you`ve had. Our team has reached out to you via ticket to assist you further with your funds in Escrow and with your dispute if you would like to open one. Thank you.
messages.Virginia F: I wish they would just stop accepting new "graphic designers", and start weeding through and getting rid of any such as the OP had the misfortune of hiring. This is getting so very old.
messages.Md Nazmul I: Hi Sadaf, I`m sorry to hear about the bad experience you`ve had. You may make a ticket to work to assist you further with your funds in Escrow and with your dispute if you would like to open one. Please submit proven screenshot.**Edited forCommunity Guidelines**
messages.Martina P: Hi Sadaf, I`m sorry to hear about the bad experience you`ve had. You may make a ticket to work to assist you further with your funds in Escrow and with your dispute if you would like to open one. Please submit proven screenshot.**Edited forCommunity Guidelines**No. No. Sigh. Just no.

messages.MD Tanzilur R: I reacently completed tow jobs successfully.But this feadback and the job do not show on my frofile.
messages.Goran V: Hi MD,Could you please reach out to me via PM (click on my name) and share your Contract ID's with me? Thank you.
messages.Pat R: People should not have to come here asking about that. It should be clearly stated somewhere on your homepage among the endless morass of useless information you have.
messages.Vladimir G: Hi Pat,We're sorry about your experience with finding the information you were looking for on our platform. Please check this Help article and let us know if you have any questions. We can see you started using Upwork recently so please don't hesitate to reach out to us here or contact Customer Support in case you need assistance with or advice about using Upwork. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.
messages.R.M P: Hi,My client and i wrote feedback for each other on 2nd july. It was an hourly contract. Contract completed on 2nd july but still not showing feedback on my profile.
messages.Petra R: Hi,My client and i wrote feedback for each other on 2nd july. It was an hourly contract. Contract completed on 2nd july but still not showing feedback on my profile.It will show within 48 hours of the client being charged, which happens later today.
messages.Waseem G: Hi, i have completed a job on December 24 and get paid. But client review is not showing. Please help.
messages.Luiggi R: HiWaseem,I checked and can see the job you're referring to showing on your profile. Can you please clear your browser cache and cookies and check again on your end? Let me know if it still doesn't appear so we can assist you further.Thank you.
messages.Chetan P: I am unable to see the review for my job that was closed last Monday. Please help!!

Your payment system never established a link with PayPal and for some reason my credit card payment never linked up to deposit funds, either. Consequently, my contract was cancelled today. I advised my representative of the situation and she said your internal IT department is looking into it. Am I the only client with this issue?

https://community.upwork.com/t5/Freelanc.title: Re: I don't want to take the extra money from Upwork

messages.Joanne Marie P: Hi Mrwan,I checked, and it looks like you have posted this information on your ticket. I'll go ahead and follow-up with the team about this so that they check. Thanks!
messages.Andrei T: You're trying to be fair, but processing the request will likely cost Upwork more than the amount involved. That's the reason why you've got the money in the first place - to make the issue go away.The best you can do for a positive impact is to minimize your inteactions with support staff - which means to just keep the money and move on.An even smarter choice would have been to reconsider the entire situation when the client changed their mind and asked for the files. At that point you should have factored into the price all the mess they created and charge accordingly.
messages.Heather N: Much respect to you for trying to do the right thing.

messages.Henadz K: Hi Upwork team and all!Sounds like I have the same request: I need a hard copy of the IRS Form 6166 for Belarus for the year 2020. Unfortunately, e-copy doesn't work for us.Is there a chance to get it from you guys?Thanks in advance!
messages.Goran V: Hi Henadz,Our team will reach out to you via ticket as well and will assist you further with your form. Thank you.
messages.Yahor K: Tax office requires the original form or at least "graphic image with color seal" ("графический образ с цветной печатью"). I suppose that it means "a digital version" or "a good scan copy" of the form. The support team can provide a poorly scanned copy only. Is it possible to get such kind of copy?
messages.Aliaksandr S: Hello! Having same issue: tax service requested original form or at least "graphic image with color seal" with a blue background and stamp on it, not just a black copy. Could you please provide me such?

messages.John A: I don't have an "on / off" switch. How do I get it or see it?
messages.Andrea G: HiJohn,Please check out this help article for some advice on how toTroubleshoot the Desktop App. If you need any further assistance please feel free to:Click your name at the lower left of the appSelect Support and FeedbackEnter the details of your issue and click SendThanks!
